task.title: How to Cancel a Reservation
task.shortdesc: If it turns out you can't make your reservation, here's how to cancel.

context.p: A reservation must be cancelled at least two days before the date, or a late cancellation fee will be applied to your card.

step.cmd: Click on "My Reservations" in the top, right corner.
Click "Cancel Reservation" under the reservation you wish to cancel.
Give us a reason for why you cancelled your reservation.
